mapper.select: select g.prod_stk_clos_no --마감번호 , to_char(g.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt --마감일자 , coalesce(a.wh_no,0) as wh_no --창고번 , coalesce(f.wh_nm,'창고미지정') as wh_nm --창고명 , c.prod_no --품번 , c.prod_nm --품목제조보고 품명 , c.erp_prod_nm --ERP 품명 , coalesce (g.iwh_qty,0) as iwh_qty --재품입고 , coalesce (g.owh_qty,0) as owh_qty --재품출고 , coalesce (a.stk_qty,0) as stk_qty --재품최종재고 , coalesce (d.stk_qty,0) as jb_qty --전일재고 , case when coalesce(d.stk_qty ,0) + coalesce(g.iwh_qty ,0) - coalesce(g.owh_qty ,0) != coalesce(a.stk_qty ,0) then 'Y' else 'N' end as stk_chk --재고 체크 from prod_info c left join prod_stk a on c.prod_no = a.prod_no left join wh_info f on a.wh_no = f.wh_no and f.used_yn = 'Y' left join prod_stk_clos g on a.wh_no = g.wh_no and a.prod_no = g.prod_no and to_char(g.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') left join ( select a.wh_no , a.prod_no , to_char(a.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt , coalesce (sum(stk_qty),0) as stk_qty from prod_stk_clos a where to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now() + '-1 day'::interval,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by wh_no,prod_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) d on a.wh_no = d.wh_no and a.prod_no = d.prod_no where 1 = 1 and c.used_yn = 'Y' order by prod_nm

select count(a.prod_no) from ( select a.prod_no --품번 from prod_info c left join prod_stk a on c.prod_no = a.prod_no left join wh_info f on a.wh_no = f.wh_no and f.used_yn = 'Y' left join prod_stk_clos g on a.wh_no = g.wh_no and a.prod_no = g.prod_no and to_char(g.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') left join ( select a.wh_no , a.prod_no , to_char(a.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt , coalesce (sum(stk_qty),0) as stk_qty from prod_stk_clos a where to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now() + '-1 day'::interval,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by wh_no,prod_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) d on a.wh_no = d.wh_no and a.prod_no = d.prod_no where 1 = 1 and c.used_yn = 'Y' ) a

select distinct a.wh_no , coalesce(e.wh_nm,'창고미지정') as wh_nm , b.matr_no , b.matr_nm , g.matr_stk_clos_no , to_char(g.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt --마감일 , floor (coalesce (d.stk_qty,0)) as jb_qty --전일재고 , floor (coalesce (g.iwh_qty,0)) as iwh_qty --자재입고 , floor (coalesce (g.owh_qty,0)) as owh_qty --자재출고 , floor (coalesce (a.stk_qty,0)) as stk_qty --자재재고 , case when coalesce(d.stk_qty ,0) + coalesce(g.iwh_qty ,0) - coalesce(g.owh_qty ,0) != coalesce(a.stk_qty ,0) then 'Y' else 'N' end as stk_chk --재고 체크 from matr_info b left join matr_stk a on b.matr_no= a.matr_no and a.used_yn = 'Y' left join matr_stk_clos g on a.wh_no = g.wh_no and a.matr_no = g.matr_no and g.used_yn = 'Y' and to_char(g.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') left join wh_info e on a.wh_no = e.wh_no and e.used_yn = 'Y' left join ( select a.wh_no , a.matr_no , to_char(a.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt , coalesce (sum(stk_qty),0) as stk_qty from matr_stk_clos a where to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now() + '-1 day'::interval,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by wh_no,matr_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) d on a.wh_no = d.wh_no and a.matr_no = d.matr_no where b.used_yn = 'Y' and b.matr_tp = #{matrTp} order by floor (coalesce (d.stk_qty,0))

select count(a.matr_no) from ( select distinct a.matr_no from matr_info b left join matr_stk a on b.matr_no= a.matr_no and a.used_yn = 'Y' left join matr_stk_clos g on a.wh_no = g.wh_no and a.matr_no = g.matr_no and g.used_yn = 'Y' and to_char(g.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') left join wh_info e on a.wh_no = e.wh_no and e.used_yn = 'Y' left join ( select a.wh_no , a.matr_no , to_char(a.clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as clos_dt , coalesce (sum(stk_qty),0) as stk_qty from matr_stk_clos a where to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now() + '-1 day'::interval,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by wh_no,matr_no,to_char(clos_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) d on a.wh_no = d.wh_no and a.matr_no = d.matr_no where b.used_yn = 'Y' and b.matr_tp = #{matrTp} ) a

select to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') as chk_dt , a.meas_val1 - b.pass_qty1 as meas_val1 , a.meas_val2 - b.pass_qty2 as meas_val2 from equip_mngr_hstr a join init_counter b on to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(b.proc_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') join (select max(unix_hms) as unix_hms from equip_mngr_hstr ) c on a.unix_hms = c.unix_hms
SELECT a.spot_no ,--센서번호 a.spot_nm FROM spot_info a where a.used_yn = 'Y'
